name: FortiSOAR Health Assessment > YAML File Generation

params.name: FortiSOAR Health Assessment Recommandation YAML
params.description: This is Playbook Generated File by FortiSOAR Health Assessment

steps.name: Set Recommended Configuration in YAML file

arguments.name: FortiSOAR Health Assessment
arguments.operationTitle: Set Recommended Configuration in YAML file

step_variables.YML:
optimal:
  elasticsearch:
    mask: False
    # Below values are in GB
    xms: 4
    xmx: 4
  postgres:
    max_worker_processes: 8
    max_parallel_workers_per_gather: 2
    max_parallel_maintenance_workers: 2
    max_parallel_workers: 8
    max_connections: 200
    checkpoint_completion_target: 0.9
    default_statistics_target: 100
    random_page_cost: 1.1
    effective_io_concurrency: 1
    huge_pages: try
    # Below values are in GB
    min_wal_size: 1
    max_wal_size: 4
    effective_cache_size: 4
    # Below values are in MB
    shared_buffer: 1024
    work_mem: 8
    maintenance_work_mem: 512
    wal_buffers: -1
  tomcat:
    # Below values are in MB
    xms: 256
    xmx: 4096
  php:
    max_children: 20
    start_servers: 6
    min_spare_servers: 4
    max_spare_servers: 8
    # Below value is in MB
    acpu: 512
    admin_memory_limit: 1024
  mq:
    scheduler: 4
  workflow:
    autoscale: True
    max_consumer: 12
    min_consumer: 8
    process: 10
    rule_engine_worker: 8
  hardware:
    # Number of cores
    cpu: 8
    # Below value is in GB
    ram: 32
    ram_percent_error_margin: 10.00

routes.name: Create YAML File -> Set Recommended Configuration in YAML file
Generate YML Code -> Create yml File
Set Recommended Configuration in YAML file -> Output
